field.name: summary
field.value: CreateClassProxyWithTarget - Adding a dynamic decorator to a preexisting object

field.name: description
field.value:
This is the central place for the new feature CreateClassProxyTypeWithTarget I am going to develop.
As described in http://saftsack.fs.uni-bayreuth.de/~dun3/archives/adding-dynamic-decorator-proxy-to-object/416.html and following posts, I would like to add additional behaviour after the object is already instantiated.

comment.author: dun3
comment.text: Attached a first patch. I know that a lot of the files do not comply to commit rules and there are by far too little validity checks. But the intention of this patch is to get feedback about my general approach to the problem. Any suggestions? Thanks!

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: Any chance to get the patch updated for current code?

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: * '''Summary''' changed from ''CreateClassProxyTypeWithTarget - Adding a dynamic decorator to a preexisting object'' to ''CreateClassProxyWithTarget - Adding a dynamic decorator to a preexisting object''.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Fixed''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''2.5''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Work Started'' to ''Resolved''.
